Text: Thank you so much! I've been compiling my own Vonnegut collection from other sources, but your's looks better. I'll see if I can convert some of this other works into mobi format and clean it up.  thanks again!

OMG, I guess I'll try Cat's Cradle this way. My library is having trouble getting a loaner of it.

Kurt actually was awarded an honorary PhD for Cat's Cradle I've heard.

Hey worked like a charm.  Thanks for keeping this torrent turned on!
It works in the free Amazon kindle for PC too.

I'll go ahead and pull the whole thing for kicks and seed indefinitely.
Long live TPB!
Not PhD, not honorary.  From Wikipedia: "The University of Chicago later accepted his novel Cat's Cradle as his thesis, citing its anthropological content, and awarded him the M.A. degree in 1971"
